subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan scored a goal and set up another in Everton’s 5-1 Premier League victory over Hull City and said he would be happy to extend his loan from the Los Angeles Galaxy a little.
snippet: Landon Donovan scored a goal and set up another in Everton’s 5-1 Premier League victory over Hull City and said he would be happy to extend his loan from the Los Angeles Galaxy a little.
